website_summaries.verdict: A more affordable option for a top-tier impact driver from Bosch.
pros: Same great performance and capabilities as other premium Bosch impact drivers
cons: Slim batteries won't provide the same charge more expensive options offer

customer_reviews.title: After 6 years still works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it six years ago. Still works really nice and no issues at all. The drill have enough power for my home projects and is an excellent addition to my Bosch drill. Same batteries and they came with 2 each. I recommend it because until now I never have any problem you will have a good experience every time that you use it.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Bosch impact. Used my first one Monday through Friday eight hours a day. used it for six years and the brushes wore out. Tuff tool.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: a great tool, such that I
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a similar one that failed in less than a year. I had not registered it and lost the warranty. Keeping my fingers crossed so this one doesn't fail. Otherwise, a great tool, such that I,m buying the different tools to complete a system.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Best tool I've purchased in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether I needed this tool that was featured in the Goldbox special. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it works wonders on driving screws on a range of jobs I had from screwing down stairs on a staircase to putting up Sheetrock. It made each of those jobs much faster and more pleasant. It is loud, however - like a mini jackhammer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lopucki

customer_reviews.title: Contractor worthy
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally durable. Plenty of power for driving screws. Long battery life. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of an anomaly. I do love creating. That includes just about everything from sewing, to needlework, to gardening, to cooking, baking and yes woodworking and home improvement. I am not afraid of power tools and I love building everything from the ground up. I have 8 drills. I have power drills impact drills, drivers, wrenches. THIS IS THE BEST I HAVE EVER OWNED. WELL worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MissE Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for best quality
customer_reviews.text: Great drill. I've had them all...Makita, DeWalt, Milwaukee etc and this one is every bit as good and in many ways better. Don't hesitate to buy one of there drill/screw guns.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Berghoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drill at work for the past 4 years. I was so impressed with that one that I bought my own for the shop at home. Never had a problem with either of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mazingo

customer_reviews.title: If you love good tools.....
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews in a major tool publication, I chose Bosch for it's features, reasonable price and well known quality. The led light is a joy, the variable speed starts as slowly as needed & the power and ergonomics make me smile every time I use it. I added a keyless, impact rated chuck and gave away my cordless drill......
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: A powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a powerhouse!!well made,and lightweight. Bosch did a great gob on this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Always love Bosch products
customer_reviews.text: We have a woodworking shop and the guys love this drill. Handles well and battery lasts a long time. Holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Dgm

customer_reviews.title: Reconditioned but looks and performs like new! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, item looked brand new. Batteries hold charge like new. I've used it a lot and I would expect it to last a long time. Works great, very lightweight compared to my Dewalt drill I've been using.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Grose

customer_reviews.title: This is the right tool for the right job!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to get the job done. I love the power and the long life of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Delancey

customer_reviews.title: bosch impact
customer_reviews.text: Best driver, I have used other brands for set building at our local theater, the Bosch lasts longer per charge and has better driving power. Wish all our tools were Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: William Honecker Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bosch impact driver
customer_reviews.text: This is a must tool for installing lag bolts and carriage bolts. The impact driver has power and beats using a wrench or socket driver. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Powerful habdy tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, very powerful and valuable. Shipping was slow in my case though.
customer_reviews.author: yagel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! I should have bought one years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I should have bought one years ago. The Bosch unit is high quality and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool, it's replacing one that fell 12' to concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great and useful for us to do good by
customer_reviews.author: Wahbi Esa Naby

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for about 6 months and I am very pleased with it. Has been able to handle any task that I have asked it to do from building kids play structures to driving 3 inch screws through pressure treated 2x4's. Only issue I have is one of the batteries does not charge any more.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter the greatest Labrador

customer_reviews.title: Best Drill
customer_reviews.text: As a building contractor I have to have good tools, tools that will preform and hold up under hard daily work. This impact driver is the best I have found, bar none. It's light, battery lasts a long time and charges quickly. I have shopped around at many other places and I can't find a better price than right here at Amazon.com. So take it from a professional, this is the drill that I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Satified purchase
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend to a friend. Very useful tool that I did not think would meet my expectations. Thank you Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Michalsky

customer_reviews.title: great screw gun
customer_reviews.text: fast driving and compact, love the quick change tip. also bought a replacement bosch 18 volt 1/2 inch hammer drill
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hamming

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill but excessive wobble when drilling.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am a little too particular but the wobble from the bit was overly excessive. I come to expect there will be some wobble but for the money I had to send it back. I have other Bosch products and they all work perfect. Was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JWL

customer_reviews.title: Bosch makes great products and this is just another example of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bosch makes great products and this is just another example of a great impact wrench. I like that all their tools have interchangeable batter packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the grip. The fact that the batteries are interchangeable with my other 18V drill driver is a big advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Two batteries are nice to have and last a reasonably long time. The ergonomics of this are not as good as the dewalt or makita. Did not drive as fast or as well as those two either.
customer_reviews.author: Chach

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable trigger?
customer_reviews.text: So Far,, I've bought 3 of these in the last 2 years and ALL of them have had trigger problems. I like the light weight and battery life,, But If it's Unreliable?,, What good is it?
customer_reviews.author: Snotty

customer_reviews.title: OK. Product Handles Light Duty Jobs. Doesn't Have Enough Torque for Tougher Tasks
customer_reviews.text: Moderately happy with this impact so far. Unfortunately, it lacks the torque to remove wheel nuts from a car that are only torqued to 65 ft/lbs. That seems a bit underpowered to me, but it's not too detrimental since I have other tools (Milwaukee) that do. Overall, this product does well with things like deck screws, or any other light/medium-light duty application you would use an impact for. I just wouldn't buy it if you are expecting a lot of torque or capability.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: wabbely
customer_reviews.text: driver is made well...except the bit shaft wabbels a lot...i put in a long bit 2 1/2 inch and the tip wabbels about 3/8 inch
customer_reviews.author: Artist Neal

customer_reviews.title: New product.
customer_reviews.text: I have not started using it yet,but presume it should function like a 18volt drill.Will put it to the test soon.
customer_reviews.author: Harry G

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for about 2.5 years and it had worked very well for about 2 years. Now it only works for a couple trigger pulls and then nothing. You remove and reinstall the battery it works for a few trigger pulls. Apparently this is a relatively common issue with Bosch drivers.
customer_reviews.author: joey seidel

customer_reviews.title: This tool will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: Impact drivers are a gift from the tool gods and this Bosch is an excellent tool. Light weight, easy to control, well made. An excellent example of why I stick with Bosch tools just about all the time. Pair this with a set of Milwaukee Shockwave impact bits and you can handle anything that needs to be driven.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill but
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind when you order this drill you will not get the hard case as depicted in the picture. This is common with amazon. What you see in the picture is different from what you get. The drill and the two batteries come in a soft flimsy case made by Bosch. Drill is very good however.
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: great cordless drill replacement
customer_reviews.text: great weapon for stubborn screws and bolts....if this impact driver doesn't get the job done a pneumatic impact chisel is in order....also works well for delicate jobs
customer_reviews.author: david wilber

product_meta.title: Bosch 25618-02 18-Volt Lithium-Ion 1/4-Hex Impact Driver Kit with 2 Batteries, Charger and Bag
product_meta.description:
Bit is made of high quality rotary carbide, for long drilling life with a tapered shank body; flute geometry removes metal shavings quickly with less vibration and weight. For use with most common rotary hammers in rotation mode.

AMAZON.COM
The Bosch 18-Volt Impactor Driver features a lightweight design for increased maneuverability in tight spaces and extended user comfort. Boasting a high-performance motor and all-metal gears, this versatile tool is rugged enough for professional jobs and user-friendly enough for the weekend worker. Bit changes are easy with the 1/4-inch hex drive, and a built-in LED provides extra light when needed. Electronic Cell Protection results in longer battery life and better performance. The driver comes with two batteries, belt clip, Phillips bit, and carrying bag. 

 

18V Lithium-Ion
Impactor Driver
At a Glance:  * Compact driver fits into tight spaces and reduces fatigue
   
   
 * Robust motor and all-metal gears deliver 2,800 rpm or 3,200 bpm
   
   
 * 1,500 in./lbs. of torque with variable speed trigger to match speed to job
   
   
 * Electronic Cell Protection protects battery for longer life and better performance
   
   
 * One-year limited warranty


Up to 27 percent faster than comparable cordless impact drivers and impact wrenches. View larger. 
Compact design fits into tight corners and is easy on the arm. View larger. Bosch Impactors: Faster Performance for Increased Productivity
This driver is part of Bosch's new line of Impactor drills and drivers. Powered by lithium-ion batteries, these tools are up to 27 percent faster than comparable cordless impact drivers and impact wrenches. In the demanding world of metal fastening and serial screw driving applications, the increase in speed means a significant boost to productivity.The Bosch impact driver is capable of driving a 3-inch all-purpose screw into a pressure-treated 4-by-4 in about one second, and can drive a 3- by 1/4-inch lag bolt into a pressure-treated 4-by-4 in less than four seconds.

Dynamic Torque with Variable Speed Trigger for Control
The driver's robust motor and all-metal gears deliver 2,800 rpm or 3,200 bpm for fast results. For driving force, its hammer and anvil system produces 1,500 in./lbs (125 ft./lbs.) of dynamic torque. Thanks to a variable speed trigger, it's easy to match the correct speed to the job.

Compact, Lightweight Body for Easy Handling
All this power comes in a lightweight package that fits into tight corners, so it won't overtax arm or hand muscles. At 5-3/4 inches long and 3-1/3 pounds, this impact driver is one of the most compact on the market.

User-Friendly Features Save Time and Reduce Fatigue
This user-friendly tool is easy to handle, even for the novice user. In addition to its compact size, the driver features a spring-loaded impact mechanism to reduce user fatigue. A 1/4-inch hex drive makes for fast, easy bit changes, while externally accessible brushes makes replacements easy.

To help out in dark corners or other low-light areas, the driver provides a built-in LED light for instant illumination.

About Bosch Lithium-Ion Batteries
Capable of driving up to 150 3- by 1/4-inch lag bolts between charges, this tool is powered by an 18-volt battery from Bosch's line of lithium-ion batteries, all of which boast Electronic Cell Protection. This battery pack design protects both the battery and the tool by preventing the three main causes of battery failure--overheating, overloading, and deep discharging. The results are optimal battery life and performance, 35-percent more run time, and up to two times as many recharge cycles.

Warranty Information
The Bosch 18-Volt Impactor Driver is backed by a manufacturer's one-year limited warranty.

What's in the Box
Driver, two batteries, charger, Phillips bit, belt clip, and carrying bag.






FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Most Compact Impactor Design - For increased maneuverability in tight spaces and extended comfort.

See more
feature_bullets: Most compact - 25-Percent Shorter than the competition. The most compact design - Only 5.7-Inch Long!
Faster and more torque - 2,800 RPM and 1,500 Inch/lbs of torque
Highest BPM in category - over 3,200 BPM
Led light - for use in dark areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
